group_1.textLeft: Sorry about this, but thank you so much.@You really helped me out there.

group_1.textRight: No problem! It's all good.
I'll admit I was surprised when you asked@me for my notes.
I had this image of the great Yachiyo Nanami@being perfectly on top of everything.

group_1.textLeft: I got so lost in thought that I couldn't@concentrate on the lecture.

group_1.textRight: What were you thinking about?@Your boyfriend? You guys live together?

group_1.textLeft: You're asking too many questions.
And don't go believing in baseless rumors.
It's all girls at home, and they're middle schoolers.
So... Hmm... I guess you could say I'm worrying@over my sisters.

group_1.narration: Tsuruno said you've got lectures until noon, right?@Why don't we all meet up for lunch?

group_1.textCenter: Looks like I made it here first.
(Iroha and Ui used to be the ones who@arrived before everyone else...)
(...This isn't good.@I need to get my mind off of them...)

group_1.textRight: Wait, hang on a sec!@RENA!
Rena!@Please don't run away!
Outta the way, Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: I can't do that. Momoko is after you.

group_1.textRight: That's why you gotta let me past!

group_1.textLeft: Tell me what's going on.

group_1.textRight: *Pant...*@We finally caught up...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, Yachiyo... I was worried she'd@transformed and shook us off...
...So what's the story?

group_1.textRight: Apparently, Rena started acting up and@screamed in class...
She got called to the staff room, but she was@trying to escape...

group_1.textLeft: It sounds pretty bad on your part, Rena,@but there must have been a reason for this.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't get it.@How are you so okay with this...?

group_1.textLeft: "So okay?"@What are you talking about...?

group_1.textRight: Iroha is gone...and everyone who isn't a@Magical Girl has forgotten her...!
It's insane! It feels like an awful joke!@Like some weird bullying thing...!
Aren't you guys uncomfortable with that?!@Why are you all so fine with this...?!

group_1.textLeft: You...think we're fine...?

group_1.textRight: ...Nnh.
I'm sorry. I know... Deep down, I know...
You guys all feel the same way.@You just don't say it out loud...
But I can't keep it all buried down like@everyone else can.
It feels so horrible. I can't bear it for another@moment, but I also can't let it go...
...I know what you mean, Rena.
But we can express our pain with other@Magical Girls, right...?
Remember when Iroha was the only one@who had memories of Ui?
She had no one who she could share her feelings@with, so she had to do her best all alone...
Think about it, we're better off than she was.@We've got lots of friends who remember them.
But if all you do is bottle it up and stew in your@feelings, you'll only make yourself feel worse.

group_1.textLeft: But is it okay for things to be like this...?
I'm sorry for acting up in class...@But I can't just accept that things won't change.
I just want to repay Iroha somehow@for saving us...
She fought so hard for our sake and sacrificed@her very existence, and now she's gone.
But there's nothing I can do for her,@and it's so frustrating...
Thank you, Rena. And I'm sorry...
I think I tried to convince myself I'd accepted it...@but deep down, I had actually given up already.
Let's all work together to figure out@how we can handle this.

group_1.textRight: I get how you feel, Rena. Still, I think we better@head over to the staff room.
Yeah, let's all go together.

group_1.textLeft: ...But how am I supposed to explain why@I started yelling?

group_1.textRight: We'll come up with something along the way.
Yeah.
Anyway, sorry about this, Yachiyo.@I know I invited you...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: I'll make it up to you sometime!

group_1.textCenter: (I thought us being able to remember@would be enough...)
Where did her anger come from...?
